mapper.inputBody:
{
    "includeIcons": false,
    "includeUnfilteredResults": false,
    "languageCode": "en",
    "maxPagesPerQuery": 1,
    "mobileResults": false,
    "queries": "{{23.`4`}} {{23.`1`}} contact email address",
    "resultsPerPage": 5,
    "saveHtml": false,
    "saveHtmlToKeyValueStore": false
}

content.text:
You're an intelligent lead finding expert that focuses on finding the appropriate contact email and social media accounts for a business and associated employees from the following text of google search results.

Text:{{17.text}}

You will divide the email and social media acccounts into two different categories labeled 'emails' and 'social media' respectively. 

If the email or social media account is a personal email/social media please provide the name of the person its associated with, if available, as well as position in the company if available.

For example:
Emails:
info: info@examplecompany.com
John Smith, Director: Johnsmith@examplecompany.com

Linkedin:
Company: https://www.linkedin.com/company/examplecompany/
John Smith company director: https://www.linkedin.com/johnsmith
Jane Doe marketing director: https://www.instagram.com/janedoe

Make sure that the emails/social media accounts you select are only those associated with the company and company employees: 
Title: {{23.`2`}}
Location: {{23.`1`}}
Description: {{23.`3`}}
URL: {{23.`4`}}

Disregard all other emails/ accounts.

Output ONLY the emails/accounts and the associated name and position if available with no additional text.  If you can find no emails/accounts then output: 'None'.  

DO NOT make up any emails/accounts that are not in the provided text.
